"Astarte": "Once you <c ff4f3f>complete a Mission<c>, you will receive a <c ff4f3f>reward<c>."
"Select \"<c ff4f3f>ARKS Missions<c>\" under \"<c ff4f3f>Quest<c>\" on the main menu, and receive your <c ff4f3f>reward<c>."
"You have received a <c ff4f3f>reward<c>! This is how to proceed with a <c ff4f3f>Mission<c>."
"There are <c ff4f3f>Main Missions<c>, which appear as you progress through the game, as well as <c ff4f3f>Daily Missions<c> and <c ff4f3f>Weekly Missions<c>, which change as time passes."
"Whenever you receive <c ff4f3f>rewards<c>, be sure to check if any new <c ff4f3f>Missions<c> have appeared."
"Well then, I wish you success in the future!"
"Daily Missions and Weekly Missions have been unlocked."
